title: Suspended without prior warning
body:
Hi all, i just received a 15 day suspension on my main account on the basis of poor language in chat. 
This is not going to be a sob story. i just want to know why i received NO warnings and NO chat restrictions before slamming a suspension just before preseason for saying c*nt nugget. 
I'm pretty shaken at the moment and would appreciate a response from any rioter out there.

replies.body: I'm not saying you were, but if you were toxic enough, Riot might have deemed it necessary to skip the chat bans.
Thats what i was thinking, but im pretty sure thats the worst thing i've said. need to see logs cause im pretty confused.
You could send a support ticket at least asking for the logs that caused you to skip punishments, because I think just for that they'd give a chat restriction. I wouldn't know though.
